sentences: I was blown away by the view.
On the first weekend morning after the long, sweltering summer finally let up, I went to a concert to welcome the fall.

message:
오늘의 영어 공부 (2026-02-07)

[오늘의 단어]
- thrill: 흥분, 설렘, 열광시키다
- put ~ off: 미루다
- doubles: 복식
- anxious: 불안해하는, 염려하는
- consistently: 일관하여, 지속적으로
- rafting: 래프팅
- arrange: 마련하다, 정리하다
- constantly: 꾸준히
- ban: 금지하다

[오늘의 문장]
- I thought that if I put it off any longer I might lose the chance forever.
- It was a very emotional moment for me.
- I quit partway through.
- I was blown away by the view.
- On the first weekend morning after the long, sweltering summer finally let up, I went to a concert to welcome the fall.
